name: FrogarOO
description:
Ctrl + F = Toggle Fullscreen (please enable it)You're working at FrogarOO and there's food waiting to be delivered! Take the package and head to the mountains up in the north as you explore these magical landscapes.

Enjoy your trip!

---

Ctrl + F = Toggle Fullscreen (please enable it)

Ctrl + G = To fix the game (just in case it gets stuck)

W + A + D + Left Mouse Button
